overview: Kendo has done it again with his new masterpiece Playing - an exploration into the dark penetrating world of role-play and secret pleasures that don't necessarily associate with 'normal' sex. Pushing the boundaries as always, The quality of the mind sometimes engages in activities not conventionally viewed as being sexual in nature but enhances the sexual bond between lovers alike. Kendo has edited this film in an avant-garde style that complements the unconventional subject matter."This is my most diverse film to date drawing from many forms of playing from the sex itself to the deep meaningful edit that has made this my best film to date.
title: Playing
